topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54da8cf663687221d5d00c00#post_54da8cf663687221d5d00c00
It's pretty much about a forest of animals (Represented by Super-deformed people in costumes) Who are useless at what they do. (A Pathetic wolf, A thugish rabbit, A Near-sighted Hawk, A Clumsy Cheetah, Etc.)
